Title: #130: Jim Collins—How to Build an Enduring, Great Company
Description:
Want to create a company that’s built to last or take your business from good to great? Then listen in because one of our favorite guests is joining us for a unique conversation about both. Jim Collins, best-selling author, researcher and lifelong teacher of leadership, calls in for an in-depth discussion on what makes successful companies tick. If you want to be great by choice, don’t miss this podcast!
